description:
This is a Private apartment (No Sharing) , Clean, New & Super Convenient to transportation (buses & subway station) , foods and services. (only 1-2 minutes away) About 30 minutes from Manhattan and airports (LaGuardia, JFK, and Newark). Extremely Safe Neighborhood.

The entire apartment is yours. You are free to use everything in the kitchen, bedrooms, and bathroom. Free Wi-Fi will be provided, and you can watch the TV with our HD Netflix account.

Limited interaction, but will answer any questions that you may have before and during your staying promptly.

This neighborhood is safe, convenient and with plenty of great restaurants and some bars that you can hangout with your friends. There's also big public parks, view of the bridges, sea and statue of Liberty within walking distance.

Free parking on the street is available within 2-5 streets. Over 20 different restaurant and bars nearby. Eat & Drink like a New Yorker.
name: 2 Bedrooms apt,Modern New Renovated
review: Nice place... alot of door entry codes to remember, but overall good place to stay. Close to all stores and shopping.
